ModMetaData.name: Superhero Genes - Hero Organization
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This requires [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3088653906]Villains and Stereotypes[/url] because it needs to reference multiple parts of that mod, most notably the League of Villains is a target of many quests, Some of the backgrounds are used for both factions, and the xenotypes are used by all of the pawns.
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url]
[url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
